body_html: I'm not sure how related this is, but I had one of the abovementioned issues, "undeclared inclusions in rule ..stream_executor", with another GPU (K80), and downgrading from Bazel 0.1.2 to Bazel 0.1.1 helped.

body: I'm not sure how related this is, but I had one of the abovementioned issues, "undeclared inclusions in rule ..stream_executor", with another GPU (K80), and downgrading from Bazel 0.1.2 to Bazel 0.1.1 helped.
